sections.purpose: To incubate and shake cultures simultaneously under controlled conditions.
sections.scope: Applicable to aerobic culture growth and expression studies.
procedure: Set the desired temperature and allow chamber to equilibrate.
Load culture flasks and distribute weight evenly.
Close the door and start both incubation and shaking.
Monitor periodically for abnormal noise or temperature deviations.
Stop the shaker and open the door carefully at the end.
Remove cultures and clean any spills inside.
precautions: Ensure proper balancing of the load.
Do not exceed recommended flask sizes or fill volumes.
Keep the door closed during operation to maintain conditions.
Use appropriate closures to prevent aerosol formation.
Perform routine maintenance as per manufacturer instructions.
